contents:
我觉得有意思的是中共的新闻里写的是“制裁美方4名官员”。人卢比奥科鲁兹史密斯都是民选的议员，怎么就当你这儿变官员了，而美国制裁的四人名单里面，列明了都是中共的书记（The sanctions were imposed on Chen, a member of China's powerful politburo; Zhu Hailun, a former deputy party secretary of the region; Wang Mingshan, the director and Communist Party secretary of the Xinjiang Public Security Bureau; and former party secretary of the bureau Huo Liujun).

所以又是一出中共绑架中国人民的好戏，墙内开心就好。
